name: These Augments are Bananas!
description:
These Augments are Bananas!

Follow the blue butt ape as he goes ballistic on the logger intrusion on his rainforest!

Smash your keys and some skulls in a upgrade-em action keysmasher.

This was made for the Toxic Monkeys 2021 "Jungle Jam" with the prompt: "We av' da teknologe"
